description:
Seven Fields, also known as Tian Qi, is a former member of Full Moon Guild. He is currently a member of Happy Guild. He first meets http://anidb.net/ch89102 [Ye Xiu] in the 10th Server when they form a party to complete the Green Forest dungeon. Seven Fields is a friend of http://anidb.net/ch89112 [Sleeping Moon]. He is an experienced player in Glory.
Source: The King`s Avatar Wiki
name: Tian Qi
